title: Equipment Features
tags: where to get equipment in bg3
content:
lint and Steel

When dealt fire damage, the target must make a Constitution save or be set alight.

Gloves of Fire Resistance

When the wearer has 50% Hit Points or less, they have Fire Resistance

Slippery Chain Shirt

When the wearer heals a creature, it automatically disengages and won't trigger opportunity attacks.

Click the heels of your Boots of Speed to double your movement speed for the current turn.

Herbalist's Gloves

If the wearer heals a poisoned creature, it is no longer poisoned
